name: RagaAI-Catalyst (raga-ai-hub)
description: [项目级] Python SDK for Agent AI Observability, Monitoring and Evaluation Framework. Includes features like agent, llm and tools tracing, debugging multi-agentic system, self-hosted dashboard and advanced analytics with timeline and execution graph view 。来源: https://github.com/raga-ai-hub/RagaAI-Catalyst

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
Python SDK for Agent AI Observability, Monitoring and Evaluation Framework. Includes features like agent, llm and tools tracing, debugging multi-agentic system, self-hosted dashboard and advanced analytics with timeline and execution graph view 

来源: https://github.com/raga-ai-hub/RagaAI-Catalyst
语言: Python
Stars: 16099

genes.title: 项目结构
genes.content:

README.md
docs

genes.title: 核心特性
genes.content:
- Support for multiple LLM providers (OpenAI, XAI, ..)
- Built-in and custom detectors
- Automatic test case generation
- Allow users to add their own test cases
- Flexible evaluation scenarios
- Detailed reporting and analysis
  
![RedTeam](ragaai_catalyst/redteaming/utils/rt.png)

name: RagaAI-Catalyst/examples 模块
description: [模块级] RagaAI-Catalyst 项目的 examples 模块 (example)。来源: https://github.com/raga-ai-hub/RagaAI-Catalyst

genes.title: examples 模块说明
genes.content:
examples = sdg.generate_examples(
    user_instruction = 'Generate query like this.', 
    user_examples = 'How to do it?', # Can be a string or list of strings.
    user_context = 'Context to generate examples', 
    no_examples = 10, 
    model_config = {"provider":"openai","model":"gpt-4o-mini"}
)
